title: Dynamic Decision-Making-Based Educational Design for Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in scientific fields and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Course to strengthen educational design and technology integration competencies for administrators/leaders within organizations. Learners explore technology integration strategies applicable to real work environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply dynamic decision-making processes (framing, instrumental, and core judgment) when designing technology-integrated education.
Learners can design strategies for selecting and utilizing digital tools aligned with educational objectives in the science domain.
Learners can develop summative assessment tools to evaluate the effectiveness of technology-integrated education within limited resources.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
